original_text: And, behold, as thy life was much set by this day in mine eyes, so let my life be much set by in the eyes of the Lord, and let him deliver me out of all tribulation.
korean_text: 오늘 왕의 생명을 내가 중히 여긴 것 같이 내 생명을 여호와께서 중히 여기셔서 모든 환난에서 나를 구하여 내시기를 바라나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: as thy life was much set by this day in mine eyes,
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 네 생명이 내 눈에 귀중하게 여겨진 것처럼,

sentences.original_text: so let my life be much set by
sentences.korean_translation: 이렇게 내 생명도 귀중하게 여겨지게 하라,

sentences.original_text: in the eyes of the Lord,
and let him deliver me out of all tribulation.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 모든 환난에서 나를 건지게 하라.
